p: As an example for a nearly non-desensitizing P2X receptor we introduce the P2X 2 receptor, which, like all members of the P2X family, opens an intrinsic ion channel after extracellular application of an appropriate agonist. Analogous to the P2X 1 receptor, Fig. 8.12a shows P2X 2 currents activated by different ATP concentrations and Fig. 8.12b the corresponding dose-response curve with an EC 50 value of about 30 µM.
